ComicInfo.Penciller: Ed Benes,Joe Madureira,Mike Deodato Jr.,Ed Benes,Joe Madureira,Mike Deodato Jr.
ComicInfo.Summary: The Puritans, a highly technologically advanced organization, has sent an elite strike force back in time to eradicate the Kherubim and Daemonite bloodlines from the face of the planet forever. Hot on their heels, the WildC.A.T.s arrive in the far flung past onboard the very space vessel that brought the Kherubims to planet Earth. Get an insightful look at characters like Zealot, Marlowe, Savant, and Majestic as they were thousands of years ago.
ComicInfo.Title: Memories of Tomorrow
